dcterms:creator: K. Meng
D. Bau
A. Andonian
Y. Belinkov
dcterms:description: COUNTERFACT is a dataset specifically designed for knowledge editing, containing a variety of counterfactual knowledge. It consists of fill-in-the-blank cloze queries that can be used to observe changes in word selection.
dcterms:title: COUNTERFACT

dcterms:creator: A. Vlachos
C. Thorne
C. Christodoulopoulos
A. Mittal
dcterms:description: FEVER is a dataset about fact-checking, where the updated models are required to perform binary classification on the given claims.
dcterms:title: FEVER

dcterms:creator: O. Levy
M. Seo
E. Choi
L. Zettlemoyer
dcterms:description: zsRE is a question answering dataset that provides queries requiring models to correctly output the object entity based on the subject entity and relation within the query.
dcterms:title: zsRE
